privacyPolicy.intro: Welcome to Cloud9! To ensure a smooth and secure check-in experience, we kindly ask for your consent to collect and process your personal data in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA).
privacyPolicy.section1Text: We collect the following information during your check-in:
section1List: Full name and contact details (phone, email)
Identification document (e.g., passport or ID card)
section2List: Verify your identity (as required by Thai law)
Submit a TM30 residence notification to the Immigration Bureau, as required under Thai immigration regulations for foreign guests
Assign and send your room access code
Provide a fast and contactless check-in/check-out experience
Manage your booking and guest profile
Ensure security and personalized service during your stay
privacyPolicy.section3Title: 3. How We Store and Protect Your Data
section3List: All personal data is stored securely and encrypted.
Only authorized staff have access to your information.
Your data will be kept only as long as necessary to fulfill legal and service purposes.
section4List: Request to view, update, or delete your personal data
Withdraw your consent at any time
Contact us with any privacy concerns
